Name: Math Adventures
About the game: MATH ADVENTURES Innovative game showing that Math is not difficult or boring! Not at all! Game develops mathematic skills and abilities of player. Consists of series of tasks for children and teens. Each task includes four levels of difficulty. Your progress in game is saved what allows you play anytime on each difficulty level. You could challenge yourself doing interesting tasks and assignments. Your award is knowledge and colourful diploma with your test score. Game develops: mathematic skills and abilities counting and mathematical operations mathematic ways of thinking Game includes: interesting mathematic tasks series of tasks and assignments for children and teens 4 levels of difficulty to choose mathematic test FOR WHOM Computer game Math Adventurers is brilliant game which helps to discover world of Mathematic. Game is designed for junior and senior pupils who want to develop their mathematic skills and knowledge. Attractive tasks makes Mathematic very interesting subject. GAME CREATORS Game creators are professionals who design from years attractive and interesting educational programs helping children develop their skills. This universal product is result of cooperation of experienced pedagogues with computer programmers what guarantees that game will be useful and playable for long time. STORY In mysterious castle accompanied by friends – Julka and Antek – player will find a lot of interesting tasks which help him to develop his or her mathematic skills with great fun. Performing these tasks makes player Master of Math! DIFFICULTY LEVELS Each task includes four difficulty levels. Thanks to this solution game grows with player and is great help accompanying child for long time. There are detailed information for each task and two game friends – Julka and Antek – always could explain how to solve each question. Time which player spends with Math Adventures is full of fun, stress-free and gives long-lasting positive effect. MAIN PARTS Program consists of three main parts: game test statistics GAME – in this mode player can casually solve each task and choose each difficulty level. Results of game are saved and player always knows where improvements are needed. TEST – player solves tasks in designed order. Beautiful diploma is award which player can print and hang on the wall over the desk. STATISTICS – each player results are saved here – you have to type your name only.
